fees.description:
There are no exit fees associated with this offer. We may vary the Charges and fees at any time by notice to you, including by message on your bill. Details about Charges and fees are set out under the terms and conditions of your Market Agreement.
Usage aggregated according to Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST). Your usage may be adjusted for local time (Australian Daylight Savings Time). Further information on our charges is available at: https://pacificblue.com.au/additional-charges
For payments made by MasterCard or Visa where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by credit card or debit card.
For payments made by AMEX or any other payment where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by credit card or debit card.
This fee will apply if a direct debit, credit card or cheque payment is dishonoured or reversed.
$41.34 (inc. GST) Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees may vary and will be quoted on request.
$41.95 (inc. GST) Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees may vary and will be quoted on request.
Paper bill fee $3.30 (inc. GST) for each paper bill.

electricityContract.terms: This contract is ongoing and may be terminated by you or us in accordance with the terms of our Market Agreement. The full terms and conditions applicable to this offer are available at https://pacificblue.com.au/terms-and-conditions. For further information about this offer, our market terms or solar feed-in eligibility, call Pacific Blue on 133 669.
electricityContract.variation: Daily supply and usage rates are fixed until at least 31st May 2024 provided the network tariff code doesn't change. Excludes feed-in tariffs and other charges. We will notify you about any variations to your prices in accordance with Energy Laws.

eligibility.information: Monthly electronic billing and direct debit are both required. This offer is only available to small customers with an applicable network tariff.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Daily supply and usage rates are fixed until at least 31st May 2024 provided the network tariff code doesn't change. Excludes feed-in tariffs and other charges. We will notify you about any variations to your prices in accordance with Energy Laws.
